headline: UBS Reaffirms Buy Rating on JPMorgan (JPM) as AI Drives Revenue Growth and Innovation
summary: JPMorgan Chase & Co. (NYSE:JPM) ranks among the best financial stocks to buy according to billionaire Ken Fisher. Following an investor meeting with the bank’s Chief Data & Analytics Officer, UBS reaffirmed its Buy rating and $357 price target for JPMorgan Chase & Co. (NYSE:JPM) on November 12. The firm emphasized JPMorgan’s long-term lead in […]
